channel.title: I have vengeance GFX, how do I get that to go when I do vengeance

item.title: I have vengeance GFX, how do I get that to go when I do vengeance
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:262502”]Add -

lowGFX(GFX ID, 0)

to your code so that a GFX comes up.[/quote]Im with Jc, the command allways work.

Read full topic

item.title: I have vengeance GFX, how do I get that to go when I do vengeance
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Well I have the Vengeance gfx with the red skull but whenever I do vengeance I want it to pop up.= how do I gte it to do that?

I have this in my codeing for vengeance now.

inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste Vengeance Biotch!"; string4UpdateRequired = true;

How do I get it so the the gfx is an emote?

Read full topic
item.source: I have vengeance GFX, how do I get that to go when I do vengeance
